title: The Great Korean Pivot: From Memecoins to Machine Chips
description: As crypto trading volumes collapse in South Korea, retail investors are flocking to the stock market, fueling a state-backed AI-driven rally that’s replaced altcoin mania with semiconductor fever.

title: Since Trump's Election, Crypto Has Experienced a Wild Year-long Ride
description: The industry's staunch ally (and sometimes business partner) in the White House has brought a flood of drama, both good and bad.

title: State of Crypto: SBF (Somehow) Had Another Bad Day in Court
description: An appeals court seemed very skeptical of the FTX founder's push for a new trial.

title: Long DATs, Short Futures: A New Wrinkle On The Basis Trade
description: As regulated futures proliferate across alts, the “long DAT, short futures” trade could become an ideal way for Wall Street to capture crypto yield without touching a wallet or suffering from the intense volatility that defines crypto as an asset class, argues CoinFund’s Chris Perkins.

title: Bitcoin Whales vs Everyone Else, and the Whales Are Winning
description: Large bitcoin holders continue to offload as smaller investors accumulate, creating a stark divide in market behavior.
